findings.title: Solidity version is not locked
findings.description: It’s recommended to lock solidarity pragma to a specific stable version.

findings.title: Code is not covered with in-code documentations
findings.description: It’s recommended to add function description for all functions.

findings.title: No unit tests were developed for the project
findings.description: It’s recommended to have 100% test coverage for code.

findings.title: Lack of events and emits for crucial functionality
findings.description: It’s highly recommended to have more events and emits for crucial functionality, for example, adding/removing to excluded, fee reflection etc.

findings.title: Unreachable default condition in transfer function
findings.description: Default condition is unreachable for all ifs in transfer. It’s recommended to have 3 if..else checks and the default should be standard transfer.
